text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player rolls Perception + Empathy (difficulty 8); each success indicates how much of
the subject’s aura the character sees and understands (see the table below). A botch
indicates a false or erroneous interpretation. The Storyteller may wish to make this roll,
thus keeping the player in the dark as to just how good (or bad) the character’s
interpretation is.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: In certain circumstances, use of this power requires a die roll: for a normal Perception roll
(the Storyteller may reduce the difficulty by the character’s Auspex rating), to notice a
subject using Obfuscate (see p. 166), or to perceive a threat

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player spends a blood point and rolls Manipulation + Subterfuge (difficulty of his
victim’s Perception + Self-Control). The number of successes determines the length of the
sensory “visitations.” The precise effects are up to the Storyteller, though particularly
eerie or harrowing apparitions can certainly reduce dice pools for a turn or two after the
manifestation.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player rolls Charisma + Empathy (difficulty of the victim’s Humanity score). The
number of successes determines the duration of the altered state of feeling. Effects of
this power might include one- or two-point additions or subtractions to difficulties of
frenzy rolls, Virtue rolls, rolls to resist Presence powers, etc.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player rolls Perception + Empathy (difficulty 8); each success indicates how much of
the subject’s aura the character sees and understands (see the table below). A botch
indicates a false or erroneous interpretation. The Storyteller may wish to make this roll,
thus keeping the player in the dark as to just how good (or bad) the character’s
interpretation is.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: In certain circumstances, use of this power requires a die roll: for a normal Perception roll
(the Storyteller may reduce the difficulty by the character’s Auspex rating), to notice a
subject using Obfuscate (see p. 166), or to perceive a threat

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player spends a blood point and rolls Manipulation + Subterfuge (difficulty of his
victim’s Perception + Self-Control). The number of successes determines the length of the
sensory “visitations.” The precise effects are up to the Storyteller, though particularly
eerie or harrowing apparitions can certainly reduce dice pools for a turn or two after the
manifestation.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player rolls Charisma + Empathy (difficulty of the victim’s Humanity score). The
number of successes determines the duration of the altered state of feeling. Effects of
this power might include one- or two-point additions or subtractions to difficulties of
frenzy rolls, Virtue rolls, rolls to resist Presence powers, etc.

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: start; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(170, 34, 34); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
